History on YouTube

Using YouTubers to sneak public history broccoli into the YouTube cupcake.

Regina Locicero

How many people have watched a YouTube video in the past 24 hours?

past week?

past month?

"Over 1.9 Billion logged-in users visit YouTube each month and every day people watch over a billion hours of video and generate billions of views."
According to YouTube's Press Page

Red

Blue

The Project

None of their videos have sources lists and while a few mention further reading not many do. I would like to go through their videos and create sources lists for them.

Logistics

  • Work with the channel to see if they have retained anything from those videos
  • Need a team of people willing to comb through each video to do research and come up evidence that either supports or refutes it
  • Funding
    • PBS Digital Studios
    • Crowdfunding

Thanks!
